config.webcam-bb.title: Webcam Settings
text.webcam-bb.webcam_error.title: Webcam error!
text.webcam-bb.webcam_error.webcams_are_: All available webcams are busy or could not be opened
text.webcam-bb.webcam_notify.title: Webcam
config.webcam-bb.tooltip.camera: List of available capture devices. Virtual cameras not supported.
config.webcam-bb.tooltip.player: Settings for rendering on the player model
config.webcam-bb.description.fps: Not exactly FPS. Controls how often a new image buffer is calculated.
config.webcam-bb.description.compression: Video compression level (0–99). Lower means higher quality.
config.webcam-bb.description.corner: Determines where on the screen the rendering window is located.
config.webcam-bb.description.render: Enables or disables the render camera.
config.webcam-bb.description.rotation: Controls whether the image rotates with the player’s head.
config.webcam-bb.description.playerRende: Controls the size of the camera surface on the player model.
config.webcam-bb.description.playerOffse: Positions the render plane left or right.
Positions the render plane up or down.
Positions the render plane forward or backward.
